name: Crystal Shard
effect:
Attach Crystal Shard to 1 of your Pokémon that doesn’t already have a Pokémon Tool attached to it. If that Pokémon is Knocked Out, discard this card.
As long as Crystal Shard is attached to a Pokémon, that Pokémon’s type is {C}. If that Pokémon attacks, discard this card at the end of the turn.
author: Takumi Akabane
